TITLE: Episode 39 - Face Touching for Freedom
DESCRIPTION: It’s a couple weeks into the quarantine and Eric from Rebel with A Cause Podcast joins the Vixens to discuss Tom Hanks disease and the government’s response. The trio talk about how the virus has affected their personal lives. Everyone touches their face the entire episode.
